overview: Brings alive - through archival footage and other never before seen treasures alongside interviews with Carl Bernstein and other luminaries - the world of photojournalism as it used to be. Frank Hoy and Tom Hoy, twin brothers managed to secure jobs at the two most prominent DC newspapers: The Washington Post and The Evening Star.
tagline: Twin brother photojournalists lead us back to a pre-digital era, when Americans read newspapers and facts mattered.
title: The Hoy Boys
